item.title: Exploring the Power of the `use` Hook in React 19
item.description: Learn how React's new `use` hook simplifies async and context handling with practical examples.

item.title: 10 Common React Performance Mistakes (and How to Fix Each One)
item.description: Improve your React apps by avoiding these 10 common performance mistakes. Learn what causes slowdowns—and the practical fixes that make your UI faster and more efficient.

item.title: React 19: What’s New
item.description: React 19 brings major architectural changes including the new Compiler, enhanced useEffect behavior, and improved performance.
